@Oprah Oprah, I know you don’t have time to read these, but thank yous are important. Thanks for this interview. I listened to all if it driving home from Nashville and it helped me feel encouraged about being a mom and just really a human in general. Y’all both inspire me. Thanks.

@Oprah Gen 20:11 Abraham  replied, "I thought, 'This is a godless place. They will want my wife and will kill me to get her.' 

Is this verse weird or Sarah received her biblical Botox. She 90 years old and Abraham feared King Abimelech will kill him to take Sarah. She must be beautiful
